        public java.util.List<Item> getInventory()

      • playTurn

        public Action playTurn(Actions actions,
                       GameMap map,
                       Display display)
        By default, non-player Actors act randomly. To change that, override this method.
        Parameters:
        actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
        map - the map containing the Actor
        display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
        Returns:
        the Action to be performed

      • getAllowableActions

        public Actions getAllowableActions(Actor otherActor,
                                   java.lang.String direction,
                                   GameMap map)
        Returns a collection of the Actions containing an AttackAction that the otherActor can do to the current Actor.
        Parameters:
        otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
        direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
        map - current GameMap
        Returns:
        A collection of Actions.

      • isConscious

        public boolean isConscious()
        Returns true if the current Actor has positive hit points. Actors on zero hit points are deemed to be unconscious.
        Returns:
        true if and only if hitPoints is positive.

      • heal

        public void heal(int points)
        Add points to the current Actor's hitpoint total. This cannot take the hitpoints over the Actor's maximum. If there is an overflow, hitpoints are silently capped at the maximum. Does not check for consciousness: unconscious Actors can still be healed.
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to add.

      • hurt

        public void hurt(int points)
        Do some damage to the current Actor. If the Actor's hitpoints go down to zero, it will be knocked out.
        Parameters:
        points - number of hitpoints to deduct.

      • getWeapon

        public Weapon getWeapon()
        If the current Actor is carrying weapons, returns the first one in the inventory. Otherwise, returns the Actor's natural fighting equipment e.g. fists.
        Returns:
        the Actor's weapon or natural

      • getIntrinsicWeapon

        protected IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
        Creates and returns an intrinsic weapon. By default, the Actor 'punches' for 5 damage. Override this method to create an Actor with more interesting descriptions and/or damage.
        Returns:
        a freshly-instantiated IntrinsicWeapon

      • hasSkill

        public boolean hasSkill(java.lang.Enum skill)
        Returns true if and only if the current Actor has the required skill.
        Specified by:
        hasSkill in interface Skilled
        Parameters:
        skill - the skill required
        Returns:
        true if and only if the current Actor has the required skill
